document.full_text: oil rose slightly in volatile trading on thursday, rebounding from a 5 percent plunge in the previous session as a weaker dollar prompted investors to buy riskier assets.
document.title: oil rebounds in volatile day as dollar weakens
lines_and_colors: oil rose slightly in volatile trading on thursday, rebounding from a 5 percent plunge in the previous session as a weaker dollar prompted investors to buy riskier assets.
